info-registry-entry.namespace-title: Namespace of identifiers for sequence records in DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank

namespace-authorithy.organisation-address: National Center for Biotechnology Information, National Library of Medicine, NIH, Building 38A, 8600 Rockville Pike, Bethesda, MD 20894

identifier-syntax.description: DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank Accession Numbers are identifiers assigned to all publicly available nucleotide sequences submitted to the International Nucleotide Sequence Database DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank. Nucleotide sequence accession numbers can be 1 letter + 5 digits or 2 letters + 6 digits. Whole Genome Shotgun sequence project accession numbers are 4 letters + 8-10 digits. The first two digits represent the version number of the assembly and the subsequent 6-8 represent the sequence contig number.
